org.apache.flink.runtime.protocols

Interface JobManagementProtocol

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ServiceDiscoveryProtocol, VersionedProtocol
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExtendedManagementProtocol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobManager

    public interface JobManagementProtocol
extends ServiceDiscoveryProtocol
    The JobManagementProtocol specifies methods required to manage jobs from a job client.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JobCancelResult cancelJob(JobID jobID)
      Requests to cancel the job specified by the given ID.
      JobProgressResult getJobProgress(JobID jobID)
      Retrieves the current status of the job specified by the given ID.
      IntegerRecord getRecommendedPollingInterval()
      Returns the recommended interval in seconds in which a client is supposed to poll for progress information.
      JobSubmissionResult submitJob(JobGraph job)
      Submits the specified job to the job manager.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.flink.runtime.protocols.ServiceDiscoveryProtocol

        getBlobServerPort

    • Method Detail

      • submitJob

        JobSubmissionResult submitJob(JobGraph job)
                              throws IOException
        Submits the specified job to the job manager.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to be executed
        Returns:
        a protocol of the job submission including the success status
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurred while transmitting the submit request

      • getJobProgress

        JobProgressResult getJobProgress(JobID jobID)
                                 throws IOException
        Retrieves the current status of the job specified by the given ID. Consecutive calls of this method may result in duplicate events. The caller must take care of this.
        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID of the job
        Returns:
        a JobProgressResult object including the current job progress
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurred while transmitting the request

      • cancelJob

        JobCancelResult cancelJob(JobID jobID)
                          throws IOException
        Requests to cancel the job specified by the given ID.
        Parameters:
        jobID - the ID of the job
        Returns:
        a JobCancelResult containing the result of the cancel request
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurred while transmitting the request

      • getRecommendedPollingInterval

        IntegerRecord getRecommendedPollingInterval()
                                            throws IOException
        Returns the recommended interval in seconds in which a client is supposed to poll for progress information.
        Returns:
        the interval in seconds
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if an error occurred while transmitting the request
